jd:
Dear Partner,

Good Morning,

Greetings from Nukasanigroup Inc! We have below urgent long-term contract project immediately available for **Business Analyst, Atlanta, GA, Remote**. Need submissions you please review the below role, if you are available, could you please send me updated word resume, and below candidate submission format details, immediately. If you are not available, any referrals would be greatly appreciated. Interviews are in progress, urgent response is appreciated. Looking forward for your immediate response and working with you.

**Candidate Submission Format - needed from you**
Full Legal Name
Personal Cell No ( Not google phone number)
Email Id
Skype Id
Interview Availability
Availability to start, if selected
Current Location
Open to Relocate
Work Authorization
Total Relevant Experience
Education./ Year of graduation
University Name, Location
Last 4 digits of SSN
Country of Birth
Contractor Type
DOB: mm/dd
Home Zip Code

Assigned Job Details
Job Title: Business Analyst
Location: Atlanta, GA, Remote
Rate: Best competitive rate

The Georgia Department of Human Services (DHS), Office of Information Technology (OIT) is seeking a qualified candidate for the position of Business Analyst (BA) to join the agency based in Atlanta, Georgia. This position is part of a DHS team tasked to provide agency support for the State-Wide NextGen Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Project. The select individual will be working with the agency team, State NextGen ERP service providers, State Accounting Office/Department of Human Services PMO, and the DHS Finance and Human Resource business units to coordinate the NextGen project implementation activities at the agency level. This position is accountable to the DHS NextGen Project Manager and the OIT Project Management Officer.

Responsibilities
The BA serves as the communication catalysts, ensuring that agency business stakeholders and NextGen solution teams are in sync. The BA will serve as a facilitator to resolve business process issues and successfully deliver established project schedules and closing timelines.

Job Duties
At the direction of the Project Manager the BA will:
- Establish Stakeholder Register
- Assisting in scheduling and facilitating agency project meetings
- Assist stakeholders take the necessary actions/steps to achieve the goals and objectives of the project.
- Assists in coordinating project activities
- Assists in developing test plans
- Assists stakeholders with test scripts
- Documents and distributes meeting minutes
- Identifies and defines business requirements by quickly understanding business process requirements based on the input and opinions of a diverse group of users
- Works closely with Project manager to maintain project artifacts
- Develops and maintains a productive working relationship with project sponsors, vendors, and key clients.
- Documents agency business requirements in a suitable format that communicates the specific actions developed for the product and obtains appropriate approvals.

Qualifications
- Bachelor’s Degree
- 7 years’ working as a BA or 3 years’ BA experience and a BA certification
- Expert in the use of MS O365 applications
- Strong interpersonal and written communication skills
- Ability to work well with business unit SMEs, other PMs/BAs, vendors, and end users in cross-functional teams
- Possesses a broad understanding of IT and business skills
- Extremely detail-oriented, organized, structured, analytical, and logical, with strong problem-solving skills.
- Experience working with government organizations.
